_meanings:
{@--1@} Floating or drifting
about, floating in different directions.

{@--5@} Devastation, 
predatory warfare; danger from an
enemy.

{@--9@} The rust
on a mirror (dust accumulating on
its surface); {#apavarjitaviplave SucO…#} 
{#matirAdarSa ivABidfSyate#} <ls>Ki. 2. 26</ls> (where
{#viplava#} also means {#pramARabADaH#} ‘absence of
reasoning’).

{@--13@} Terrifying an enemy by
shouts and gestures.
